name: Beneath Faelin Wood
description:
A fellow Druid has gone missing. Survive long enough to discover his fate.

[Arrow Keys] or [IJKL] to move
[S]  in Druid form to Shapeshift
[S]  while Shapeshifted to swap your Active form
[A] in Druid form to open your inventory
[A] while Shapeshifted to return to Druid form
[Space] to interact with objects
[M] for map
[P] to pet (requires cat)
[F6]  to kill all enemies and toggles story mode. Monsters won't spawn in story mode. 
[F7] to reveal the whole map.

Presented by SuperTry Studios

Made for 7DRL 2020

Music by Joe Kenneally

Written by Hadley St. Clair

Game by Kevin Cole

"Dawn Chorus" from the National Park Service

Made for 7DRL 2020

This game exists because of our wonderful patrons.
